hotels.title: Ha Long Bay Beachfront All-Villa Escape with Two Pools, Three Restaurants & Onsite Spa
hotels.description: Take this chance to stumble across the perfect blend of luxury and tranquillity at this all-villa oasis and at the gateway to Vietnam's UNESCO World Heritage-listed Ha Long Bay. Stylish and modern to behold, the five-star resort is perched along the sandy shores and emerald waters of Bai Chay Beach and serves as an ideal base to explore the best treats of Ha Long, including Sun World Complex and the vibrant Ha Long Night Market. Spend your days luxuriating in the spacious, well-appointed villas, take a refreshing dip in the two outdoor pools and rejuvenate with treatments at Serenity Spa. When hunger strikes, discover the essence of Vietnamese culinary artistry as you feast on ocean-fresh grilled delicacies at Bay Grill & Mixology, tuck into Vietnamese dishes at The Market and sip on craft cocktails at Oakbar, while catching epic sunsets.

hotels.title: Ha Long Bay Novotel Retreat with Direct Beach Access, Restaurant, Pool & Spa
hotels.description: Immerse yourself in the coastal allure of Vietnam's UNESCO World Heritage-listed Ha Long Bay with a retreat steps from the golden sands of Bai Chay Beach. Spend days swimming in the sparkling outdoor pool, pampering yourself with treatments at the spa, or unwinding in rooms with sweeping windows framing stunning vistas. Delight in authentic tastes of Vietnam at The Square Restaurant, unwind with a cocktail from the Poolside Bar, or simply relax on the pristine beach. When you're ready to explore, set off on a scenic cruise to discover the emerald waters and limestone islands of Ha Long Bay, or immerse yourself in the lively atmosphere of local markets.
